mapper.sql: id, op_code, op_name, op_href, op_seq, add_time, update_time, delete_sign
mapper.insert: insert into AuthOperation (id, op_code, op_name, op_href, op_seq, add_time, update_time, delete_sign) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteSign,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
op_code,

mapper.update:
update AuthOperation
op_code = #{opCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_name = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_href = #{opHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_seq = #{opSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_sign = #{deleteSign,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update AuthOperation set op_code = #{opCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_name = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_href = #{opHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_seq = #{opSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_sign = #{deleteSign,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from AuthOperation where delete_sign = 0
and op_code like CONCAT('%', #{opCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and op_name like CONCAT('%', #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and op_href like CONCAT('%', #{opHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and op_seq = #{opSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by id desc
limit #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
